item.title: YPF 首席执行官称阿根廷瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩钻探将放缓
item.description: 阿根廷最大的原油生产商 YPF SA 公司首席执行官表示，由于公司限制支出，阿根廷瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩区的石油钻探活动近期将减弱。【原文：Oil-drilling activity in Argentina’s Vaca Muerta shale patch is set to weaken in the near term as companies restrain spending, said the chief executive officer of the region’s biggest crude producer YPF SA.】

item.title: 威廉姆斯首席执行官认为液化天然气将占据美国天然气市场 25% 以上的份额
item.description: 全球最大的管道运营商之一威廉姆斯公司（Williams Cos.【原文：Williams Cos., one of the world’s largest pipeline operators, projects liquid natural gas will expand to become more than 25% of the US gas market in the next decade.】

item.title: 美国指控中国人违反 Nvidia 芯片出口规定
item.description: 据当局称，两名中国公民本周被捕，罪名是他们违反美国出口限制，将英伟达公司生产的价值数千万美元的先进人工智能芯片运往中国。【原文：Two Chinese nationals were arrested this week on charges that they sent tens of millions of dollars worth of advanced AI chips made by Nvidia Corp. to China in violation of US export restrictions, according to authorities.】

item.title: 卡尼承诺为受特朗普冲击的木材行业提供 8.7 亿美元援助
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）承诺提供多达 7 亿加元（约合 5.08 亿美元）的贷款担保，以支持加拿大的木材业。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney promised as much as C$700 million ($508 million) in loan guarantees to shore up Canada’s lumber industry, which has been hit hard by US duties that are about to significantly increase.】

item.title: Roku 首次推出月租 2.99 美元的无广告视频服务，目标用户是对成本敏感的用户
item.description: Roku 公司推出了一项新的订阅视频服务，为该公司流媒体盒和 Roku 电视的用户提供无广告内容，而且价格比许多点播流媒体竞争对手更低。【原文：Roku Inc. introduced a new subscription video service that offers ad-free content to owners of the company’s streaming boxes and Roku TVs for less money than many on-demand streaming competitors.】

item.title: 少数阿达赫债券持有人反对与爱尔兰大亨库尔森达成重组协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿达赫集团（Ardagh Group SA）的一小部分债权人正在对该包装公司与大多数债务人达成的重组协议进行反击。【原文：A small cohort of Ardagh Group SA creditors is pushing back on the restructuring deal agreed to by the packaging company and most of its debtholders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 本周首次拍卖反应冷淡，国债市场萎靡不振
item.description: 在本周三次新票据和债券拍卖中的第一次拍卖后，国债市场仍处于守势，多数收益率当天略有上升。【原文：The Treasuries market remained on the defensive — with most yields slightly higher on the day — after the first of this week’s three auctions of new notes and bonds saw poor demand.】

item.title: 马斯克寻求撤销有关其出售 75 亿美元特斯拉股票的诉讼
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）联合创始人埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）敦促特拉华州法官驳回一起投资者诉讼，该诉讼指控马斯克在获得电动汽车制造商将无法实现 2022 年生产和交付目标的内部消息后，不当出售了超过 75 亿美元的股票。【原文：Tesla Inc. co-founder Elon Musk urged a Delaware judge to toss an investor lawsuit alleging he improperly sold more than $7.5 billion in shares after receiving inside information that the electric-car maker would miss its production and delivery targets in 2022.】

item.title: 亚马逊将首次向客户提供 OpenAI 模型
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）计划向客户提供 OpenAI 新的开放式人工智能模型，这是该云计算巨头首次提供这家领先的人工智能初创公司的产品。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. plans to make OpenAI’s new open artificial intelligence models available to customers, the first time the cloud computing giant has offered products from the leading AI startup.】

item.title: DeepSeek 成功后，OpenAI 发布开放重量模型
item.description: 在中国的 DeepSeek 以其开放式人工智能软件赢得全球关注几个月后，OpenAI 发布了一对可模仿人类推理过程的开放式免费人工智能模型。【原文：OpenAI is releasing a pair of open and freely available artificial intelligence models that can mimic the human process of reasoning, months after China’s DeepSeek gained global attention with its own open AI software.】

item.title: 对美国通胀数据的不信任威胁到价值 2 万亿美元的市场
item.description: 据债券投资者称，如果美国劳工统计局被政治化，与美国通胀数据挂钩的 2 万亿美元证券市场可能成为国债的第一个破裂领域。【原文：A $2 trillion market for securities linked to US inflation data could be the first area of Treasuries that would crack if the Bureau of Labor Statistics is politicized, according to bond investors.】

item.title: Anthropic 在竞争对手 GPT-5 发布之前推出更强大的人工智能模型
item.description: 在竞争对手 OpenAI 即将推出期待已久的 GPT-5 系统之际，Anthropic 发布了其最强大人工智能模型的新版本。【原文：Anthropic is releasing a new version of its most powerful artificial intelligence model as rival OpenAI nears the long-awaited launch of its GPT-5 system.】

item.title: 巴西计划为受关税冲击的企业提供廉价信贷并推迟债务偿还期
item.description: 据一位了解相关计划的官员透露，巴西正在最后敲定通过债务展期、降低信贷成本和支持工人工资来帮助企业减轻美国大幅关税影响的建议。【原文：Brazil is finalizing proposals to help companies mitigate the effects of steep US tariffs with debt extensions, cheaper credit and support for workers’ salaries, according to an official with knowledge of the plans.】

item.title: 技术劳工需求增加，贸易学校股票飙升
item.description: 技术工人的短缺和联邦政府对美国制造业的推动，使林肯教育服务公司（Lincoln Educational Services）和环球技术学院（Universal Technical Institute）这两家营利性职业学校运营商成为华尔街最炙手可热的两只小盘股。【原文：A skilled worker shortage and the federal government’s push to increase manufacturing in the U.S. are turning two for-profit vocational school operators — Lincoln Educational Services and Universal Technical Institute — into two of the hottest small cap stocks on Wall Street.】

item.title: 米利坚挺的比索促使阿根廷肉类包装商进口牛肉
item.description: 由于哈维尔-米莱伊总统的货币和贸易政策使得在当地价格居高不下的情况下从国外采购供应变得更加经济实惠，知名牧场国家阿根廷正在进口牛肉。【原文：Renowned ranching nation Argentina is importing beef as President Javier Milei’s currency and trade policies make it more affordable to source supplies abroad while local prices remain high.】

item.title: 市场为 Televisa 被降为垃圾级做好准备，用户纷纷逃离
item.description: 尽管有迹象表明该媒体集团在遏制用户流失方面取得了一些进展，但严峻的行业竞争和持续的断线用户群仍对 Grupo Televisa SAB 的信用评级造成压力。【原文：Tough industry competition and a persistent cord-cutting customer base continue to pile pressure on Grupo Televisa SAB’s credit ratings even amid signs that the media conglomerate has made some progress stemming subscriber losses.】

item.title: 铜价下滑，因为关税贸易的解除增加了伦敦金属交易所的库存
item.description: 随着交易商解除对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税的大规模押注，流入伦敦金属交易所全球仓储网络的资金激增，铜价下滑。【原文：Copper slipped, with flows into the London Metal Exchange’s global warehousing network surging as traders unwind massive bets on US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 漫长的新兴市场寒冬是否已经结束？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 柴油机油泵价格飙升，有可能刺激通货膨胀
item.description: 美国柴油零售价飙升至近一年来的最高点，原因是零售市场赶上了全球广泛使用的燃料供应紧张的局面，这有可能加剧通货膨胀。【原文：US diesel prices at the pump have surged to the highest in almost a year as retail markets catch up with tightness in global supplies of the widely used fuel, threatening to boost inflation.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 的鲁布纳认为快钱基金将转为熊市
item.description: Citadel Securities 公司的斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）表示，快钱投资者可能会在 9 月份之前完全持有美国股票，这可能会促使他们抛售股票，因为他们很容易受到市场下行冲击的影响。【原文：Fast-money investors will likely reach full exposure to US equities by September, which could prompt them to sell stocks as they become vulnerable to downside market shocks, according to Scott Rubner of Citadel Securities.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 7 月份原油产量略高于欧佩克+的目标值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，俄罗斯的石油数据显示，其 7 月份的原油产量略高于欧佩克+的目标。【原文：Russia’s oil data show its crude output was slightly above the nation’s OPEC+ target in July, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国将放宽远距离无人机规定，沃尔玛和 Alphabet 获益匪浅
item.description: 特朗普政府提出了一项规则，允许更多的商用无人机在操作员的视线范围外飞行，这对那些寻求使用无人机投递包裹的公司（如 Alphabet 公司的 Wing 部门和沃尔玛公司）来说是一个潜在的利好。【原文：The Trump administration proposed a rule to allow more commercial drones to fly beyond an operator’s visual line of sight, a potential boon for companies such as those seeking to deliver packages by unmanned aircraft such as Alphabet Inc.’s Wing unit and Walmart Inc.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚首位后共产主义领导人扬-伊利埃斯库逝世，享年 95 岁
item.description: 罗马尼亚前总统扬-伊利埃斯库（Ion Iliescu）去世，他领导罗马尼亚完成了从共产主义向民主制的过渡，并因自己的政治过去而饱受争议。享年 95 岁。【原文：Ion Iliescu, the former Romanian president who steered his country through its transition from communism to democracy and was dogged by controversy over his own political past, has died. He was 95.】

item.title: 美国财政部将出售创纪录的 1000 亿美元四周期国债
item.description: 美国政府计划在本周的一次国债销售中借款 1,000 亿美元，这一史无前例的数字既显示了其借款需求的规模，也显示了其吸引投资者的能力。【原文：The US government plans to borrow $100 billion in a single Treasury debt sale this week, an unprecedented figure that showcases both the magnitude of its borrowing needs and its ability to attract investors.】

item.title: S&P 警告芝加哥养老金成本上涨将给预算带来压力
item.description: 据 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，一项旨在提高芝加哥部分警察和消防员养老金福利的新法律有可能进一步加剧该市的财政压力。【原文：A new law aimed at raising pension benefits for some Chicago police and firefighters risks further straining the city’s finances, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司承诺向美国投资 10 亿美元以抵消关税影响
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司（Embraer SA）承诺在美国投资 10 亿美元，这家巴西飞机制造商正努力消除可能的关税带来的任何影响。【原文：Embraer SA pledged to invest $1 billion in the US as the Brazilian aircraft manufacturer seeks to blunt any fallout from possible tariffs.】

item.title: 逾期学生贷款创历史新高加重美国债务负担
item.description: 第二季度，美国消费者债务中严重拖欠债务的比例上升至 2020 年初以来的最高水平，反映出逾期学生贷款债务创纪录地激增。【原文：The share of US consumer debt in serious delinquency rose in the second quarter to the highest level since early 2020, reflecting a record surge in past-due student-loan debt.】

item.title: Sonos 承认过热的 Roam 扬声器数量 "非常少
item.description: Sonos Inc. 承认客户投诉的数量 "非常少"，他们声称该音响品牌的第一代 Roam 扬声器在 USB-C 端口附近过热并部分融化。【原文：Sonos Inc. acknowledged a “very low” number of complaints from customers who claim the audio brand’s first-generation Roam speaker has overheated and partially melted near the USB-C port.】

item.title: 两位前财政部长就美国国债风险发出警告
item.description: 全球金融危机期间在任的两位美国财政部部长都曾警告过 29 万亿美元的国债市场面临的潜在威胁，其中既有不可持续的财政道路，也有对华盛顿政治体制的担忧。【原文：The two US Treasury chiefs in office during the global financial crisis warned about potential threats to the $29 trillion Treasuries market ranging from an unsustainable fiscal path to concerns about the political system in Washington.】

item.title: 墨西哥力争到 2027 年实现墨西哥石油公司财务自给自足
item.description: 墨西哥提出了一项商业计划，要求墨西哥石油公司到 2027 年实现财务自给自足，同时增加产量，并在今年年底前削减约 130 亿美元的债务。【原文：Mexico presented a business plan for Petroleos Mexicanos to reach financial self sufficiency by 2027 while increasing output and slashing debt by roughly $13 billion by the end of the year.】
